articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: USWNT captain Becky Sauerbrunn to miss World Cup due to foot injury - The Guardian
articles.description: United States captain and veteran defender Becky Sauerbrunn will not be included in the squad for the Women’s World Cup due to a foot injury
articles.content:
United States captain and veteran defender Becky Sauerbrunn will not be included in the squad for the Womens World Cup due to a foot injury she suffered in April, multiple reports said Friday.
